bibl.title: The Poems of Callimachus.
bibl.note: Approximately 180 fragments are translated (with introduction and notes): Hekale; - Hymns; - Aitia 1-2; - Iambi; - Aitia 3-4; - Victory Song for Sosibios; - Epigrams. - Notes on the Text. - Annotated Index of Names. Numbering of Fragments and Epigrams: Comparative Tables. Index.
NISETICH Frank (Translated by), The Poems of Callimachus.
Oxford, University Press, 2001, 8°, lvi-350 pp. ISBN 0-19-814760-0 (hbk) / 0-19-815224-8 (pbk). £45 (hbk) / 15.99 (pbk).
